DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the difference in the results between Motec and Remotion wrist arthroplasty in the treatment of non-rheumatoid wrist arthritis.
DOC.brief_title: Motec Versus Remotion Total Wrist Arthroplasty - A Prospective Study
DOC.criteria: Patients with painful nonrheumatoid wrist arthritis (posttraumatic arthritis and late stage Kienboeck`s disease) Age 1870 years ASA class 13
